title: How to Make Apple Pancakes

steps.headline: Prepare your pancake batter as usual.
Use a grater with the apple.
steps.description: Treat the apple like cheese and grate it.

steps.headline: Add about 3/4 of the pieces to the batter.
steps.description: Add the sugar and cinnamon. Mix.

steps.headline: Cook the pancakes on a griddle or saucepan.
steps.description: Sprinkle the leftover apple pieces on top. Wait until bubbles start to form on the top and flip it over with a spatula. Cook for an additional 2 minutes or until golden brown.

text: Prepare your pancake batter as usual.  Use a grater with the apple. Treat the apple like cheese and grate it. Add about 3/4 of the pieces to the batter. Add the sugar and cinnamon. Mix. Cook the pancakes on a griddle or saucepan. Sprinkle the leftover apple pieces on top. Wait until bubbles start to form on the top and flip it over with a spatula. Cook for an additional 2 minutes or until golden brown. Finished.
